comments.comment: Phottuwe un thamai jathiwadaya aussanna. Api hamoma srilankikayan vidihata jiwath wenna oni. Phottuwe unta hitha ridila. Penawada mathi thumai. Oba thuma paradi na. Minissu ge sith dinagena iwarai. Oba thuma mathu dawasaka janadipathi wenawa ai. Horun dusithayan lankaraganna apa tharuna buddimath aya kathu karan idiriyata yamu. Rajapaksalage hora minima rum  walata sobawa darmayenma daduwam lebevi. Oba thuma duppathage hitha dinagena iwarai. Mathu dawasaka janapathi obai. Oba wenuwen janathawak innawa a aya wenuwen akwa idiriyata yamu. Budu saranai. Mathiduni.
